page.title: 20MY PONY
page.content: My pony's name is Flash, and he is nine years old. He lives in a field near the motorway. There is a large shed in the field for him to shelter in. There are two other ponies in the field as well. We pay the farmer for using his field. Each day after school I go to see Flash. I have to wear my gear, and my mum usually drives me to the field and helps me put the saddle and bridle on Flash. I usually ride him in the field. There are some small fences set up and we jump them. I have to make sure Flash is well looked after. After each ride I give him a good brushing. I make sure he has oats and horse pellets to eat and as a special treat I give him an apple. I take turns with the other girls in making sure the shed is cleared out and there is plently of clean straw for bedding.
